text:
Framer http://framer.com

Engineer | Amsterdam, full time, onsite.

Framer is building a new kind of design tool to go from ideation to production. We are looking for multiple talented engineers to join our team.

Our stack is Electron / TypeScript with specialized problems in graphics, editors, direct manipulation, compilers, animation and more.

Email me directly at koen at framer dot com for more info.
